headline: Axon Enterprise (AXON) Reports Q2 Revenue Climb To US$669 Million
summary: Axon Enterprise (AXON) recently showcased its Q2 results with revenue climbing to $669 million, though net income and earnings per share experienced declines. The company also raised its full-year 2025 revenue guidance, reflecting confidence in future growth prospects. Despite completing part of their share buyback plan, no shares were repurchased in the latest quarter. Over the past quarter, Axon Enterprise's stock rose by 5.1%. This movement aligns with broader market trends where indices...
